resources.string: This app is designed to be used only with Android Auto Interface. \n

1. Search Youtube videos using the search bar on top. 
 2. Use touch or the rotary control to select the video. 
 3. The video should start to play automatically in fullscreen.

1. Press the back button on the car control to go back to search page.\n 2. OR Close the fullscreen video using touch screen.\n 1. You can use the rotary control left / right click to seek the video by 1 minute increments.
1. Click on the Last Icon in Android Auto to see a list of all Android Auto Apps. \n 2. Select the YouStream App to start.\n
By using this App, you agree not to use the app while driving or in hazardous conditions, and relinquish any liability from the app if anything happens while using this app. \n
